topic.title: "Address Family Not Supported by Protocol Family; Connect" Error

dlentry.dd: I have experienced the following error: "Address Family Not Supported by Protocol Family; Connect". How do I solve it?

dd.p: This seems to be an IPv6 connectivity problem from that machine. By default, the Java runtime that runs on top of prefers to create connections via IPv6, if the support is available. However, even though it is available in appearance, IPv6 sometimes happens to be configured incorrectly on some systems.
A quick fix is for this problem is to set a Java property (java.net.preferIPv4Stack=true).

Follow this procedure:
Edit the custom_commons.vmoptions file that is located in the installation folder.
Add the Java property java.net.preferIPv4Stack=true and save it in the same location.
Restart .
Check to make sure the procedure was successful by going to Help About System properties and check that the value of the java.net.preferIPv4Stack property is true.
